short_summary: Upgrade communications, navigation, surveillance and air traffic management avionics and replace radar systems for the Canadian Armed Forces.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the upgrade of the communications, navigation, surveillance and air traffic management avionics as well as the replacement of the radar systems in its fleet of 4 CT142 Dash 8 aircraft.
full_summary:
### Aircraft Components and Accessories Notice
####  Solicitation Number: WS3984581681
####  Closing Date: April 14th, 2023, 14:00 EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and installation of aircraft components and accessories to upgrade the communications, navigation, surveillance, and air traffic management avionics as well as the replacement of radar systems in the DND’s fleet of 4 CT142 Dash 8 aircraft.

The requirement includes the supply and installation of the required goods at the successful bidder's facility, as well as on-site training at the DND facility located in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The anticipated completion date of the contract is September 30th, 2024.

This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W8475-215475/A, dated May 12th, 2022, with a closing date of October 27th, 2022, 14:00 MDT.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation applies to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement 
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement 
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**

The successful bidder will be expected to deliver the goods to the following region:

* Manitoba

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or to request a debriefing or feedback session, please contact:

Name: Hemy, Andrew
Email: [andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None

**Bidding Requirements**

Please ensure to meet the eligibility requirements outlined in the solicitation. All bids must be submitted online through Ariba Discovery no later than 14:00 EDT on April 14th, 2023.

Note:

* The Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time should be disregarded.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted online through Ariba Discovery by 14:00 EDT on April 14th, 2023.
